participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: frustrated and disillusioned with life, often expressing dissatisfaction with his situation.
participant_1.background: i'm 40 years old. i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: empathetic but also shares a sense of defeat, having similar struggles in life.
participant_2.background: i am planning on getting a divorce. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i'm 40 years old. i hate my job.

content.text: hello, how are you today? i am doing well.
do you work? do you have a wife?
oh cool, what do you do for a living? i sell car salesman.
what is your favorite food? mine is pizza.
i love pizza too, but not pizza. i hate it.
